name: Faded Green Bandana
data: It decreases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users wisdom unnoticably.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'interrupting force'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
